name: marriage_citizenship
title: Marriages by institutional units and citizenship (category) of the partners
title_en: Marriages by institutional units and citizenship (category) of the partners
description: This dataset presents the annual number of marriages by canton, district and commune and citizenship (Switzerland, foreign country) of the spouses, since 1969.
description_en: This dataset presents the annual number of marriages by canton, district and commune and citizenship (Switzerland, foreign country) of the spouses, since 1969.
